title: Support Rune Page
body: I am level 23 and making a support rune page, any tips on what I should get?

replies.body:
Depends on the type of support really

for disruptive damaging supports like Annie, Lulu, Karma, ect. I tend to use
Marks: Magic Penetration
Seals: Flat Health
Glyphs: Flat Ability Power or Scaling Magic Resist
Quints: Flat Ability Power

Tanky supports like Thresh, Leona, Braum, ect. I use
Marks: Flat Attack Damage
Seals: Flat Health
Glyphs: Scaling Magic Resist
Quints: Armor

I have used other set ups as well, such as 
Gold per second Quints and Seals
Scaling AP or Movement Speed Quints

There's really just a lot a viable options, it all just depends on what you think you'll need and how it fits your playstyle. Either early game (like Flat AD, AP, Armor, MR, ect) or late game (scaling AD, AP, Armor, MR, ect)
never use scaling runes botlane... it isnt efficient as they gain  levels slower..... especially support
They gain levels slowly yes, but they are very efficient by level 6 as they out scale flat runes.  I use scaling armor for ADCs as well and it works so much better then flat armor.

look at even the riot employee
nothing is wrong with using scaling
but it isnt effective botlane because of the shared (reduced) income of expecience which means you take longer to hit the breakpoint.
most high elo players use flat instead of scaling because the early game is so important in a bot lane matchup, and add that to the reduced xp makes flat a tad bit stronger than scaling
Different people find different things useful. It's been very effective for me, hence why I got Gold last season :) So it's very good in any lane.
I use flat armor seals, flat ap or hybrid pen marks/quints, and glyphs are either flat ap or flat mr

defensive runes on support are very versatile, and can be used on pretty much all of them.
if you have the ip, get hybrid pen reds, otherwise you have the option of just taking armor reds
if you have lots of ip you can go health yellows, otherwise just go armor yellows
some supports may gain from having 3 flat mana regen glyphs, if so get those and then the rest will be mr scaling for defence, flat armor, or sometimes ap.
quints, i prefer 2 hp and one armor. but sometimes I can plull off something like mana regen quints.

in order of my preferences, 

Marks - Hybrid Pen, AD, MP
Seals - Armor
Glyphs - Magic Reist
Quints - Gp10, Armor, AP, Health

are all good choices. 

Marks: Hybrid pen are quite good for many situations and are quite versitile, MP are good for your AP supports, and i mention the AD for doing damage to turrets, a few supports have AD scaling but that's about it. the AD is a bit more of a niche pick for me. 

Quints: i like to run Gp10 on many supports for a steady gold income and to get that sightstone sooner than the enemy. AP-MP is one that i'll use on supports and mages in any position, Armor is good for AD heavy team comps or if they are running an AD kill lane bot, Health is good vs. an AP kill support like annie and health is good for every champion in every role and is imo the most versatile rune in the game.

well....the easiest set up in my opinion would be 

Hybrid pen reds.
Armor Yellows.
MR Blues
And movement speed quints.

You can vary it quite a bit...but generally the armor and MR are fairly standard.  Depending on what supports you like to play...you can vary it with straight magic pen reds and some AP quints as well.
